# MX Bus Routes

[![Change to spanish version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Change%20to%20spanish%20version-006341?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](README-spanish.md)

### Note: Currently in development. It still doesn't have a playable version.

Enjoy the bus driving job experience on mexican roads in this simulator game for Windows OS.
